question: In September, 2020, a direct cargo ferry service between India and which of the following island nations started to boost bilateral trade?
explanation: The Direct Cargo Ferry Service to Maldives was launched in an e-Flag off ceremony jointly by Ministry of Shipping and Ministry of Transport and Civil Aviation of Maldives. This initiative will lead direct cargo connectivity between India and the Maldives on a predictable and affordable basis for the first time and will lower costs and times for traders in both countries
